thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mastec Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.47

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mastec Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.47
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Mastec Inc:
* MASTEC ANNOUNCES RECORD ANNUAL FINANCIAL RESULTS AND BACKLOG, AND ISSUES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.95 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $1.23 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 19 PERCENT TO $1.6 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.45 INCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $6.75 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $1.33 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.44, REVENUE VIEW $1.26 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.32, REVENUE VIEW $6.64 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
